data.comment: Nacional kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
Ruben Micael scores to make it 1-0 at Estadio da Madeira.
In the minute 1, That's a fine assist from Joao Vigario.
Throw-in for Tondela in the half of Nacional.
Ball goes out of play for a Nacional goal kick.
In the minute 4, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Tondela get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nacional's half?
Throw-in for Nacional in their own half.
In the minute 6, Tondela have been awarded a corner by Joao Bento.
Corner awarded to Tondela.
Nacional have a goal kick.
In the minute 8, Free kick for Nacional in their own half.
Corner awarded to Tondela.
Joao Bento awards Nacional a goal kick.
In the minute 10, Joao Bento signals a Tondela throw-in in Nacional's half.
Joao Bento signals a free kick to Tondela.
Tondela have been awarded a corner by Joao Bento.
In the minute 12, Goal kick for Nacional at Estadio da Madeira.
Joao Bento awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Nacional.
In the minute 14, Nacional's Bryan Rochez attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Funchal.
Tondela are coming forward and Mario Gonzalez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 15, Ball goes out of play for a Nacional goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Funchal.
In Funchal a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 18, Free kick Nacional.
At Estadio da Madeira, Bebeto has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Tondela awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 20, Ball safe as Tondela is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Tondela's Rafael Barbosa gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Nacional have a goal kick.
In the minute 21, Free kick for Tondela in the half of Nacional.
Tondela to take a throw-in in Nacional territory.
Tondela's Mario Gonzalez is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 23, Tondela's Salvador Agra breaks free at Estadio da Madeira. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Nacional at Estadio da Madeira.
Daniel Guimaraes returns to the field for Nacional after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 25, Can Tondela get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nacional's half?
Throw-in for Nacional at Estadio da Madeira.
Joao Bento signals a free kick to Nacional in their own half.
In the minute 27, Joao Bento signals a free kick to Tondela.
Nuno Borges (Nacional) has received a first yellow card.
In Funchal a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 28, Bebeto (Tondela) leaves the pitch after receiving two yellow cards.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Nacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 30, Free kick Nacional.
Salvador Agra for Tondela has been booked by Joao Bento and receives a first yellow card.
Throw-in Nacional.
In the minute 32, Tondela's Filipe Ferreira gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Nacional defender.
Throw-in for Tondela at Estadio da Madeira.
Nacional drive upfield and Joao Camacho gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Tondela defender.
In the minute 34, In Funchal Nacional attack through Brayan Riascos. The finish is off target, however.
Joao Bento awards Tondela a goal kick.
Free kick for Nacional in their own half.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Nacional in the half of Tondela.
Free kick for Tondela in the half of Nacional.
Joao Bento signals a free kick to Tondela.
In the minute 38, Goal kick for Nacional at Estadio da Madeira.
Tondela awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Joao Bento signals a Tondela throw-in in Nacional's half.
In the minute 40, In Funchal a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Tondela's Jaume Grau misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Funchal.
In the minute 41, In Funchal Nacional drive forward through Joao Camacho. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Joao Bento signals a free kick to Tondela in their own half.
Tondela to take a throw-in in Nacional territory.
In the minute 42, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Nacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Salvador Agra for Tondela drives towards goal at Estadio da Madeira. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 44, Corner awarded to Tondela.
Nacional have a goal kick.
Nacional are caught offside.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Tondela in the half of Nacional.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Nacional's Joao Camacho gets in a shot on goal at Estadio da Madeira. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 45, Joao Bento awards the home team a throw-in.
The first-half is over.
It's Tondela with the kick-off after the break.
Throw-in for Tondela in the half of Nacional.
In the minute 46, Pako Ayestaran (Tondela) is making a first substitution, with Abdel Jalil replacing Yohan Tavares.
Abdullahi Ibrahim Alhassan is replacing Nuno Borges for Nacional at Estadio da Madeira.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Nacional in their own half.
Attention is being given to Nacional’s Joao Camacho and play has been suspended briefly.
Nacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Joao Camacho for Nacional is back on the field again.
In the minute 50, Rafael Barbosa is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Ball safe as Nacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nacional have been awarded a corner by Joao Bento.
Brayan Riascos (Nacional) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 54, Ball goes out of play for a Tondela goal kick.
Ball safe as Tondela is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 54, Rafael Barbosa, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Ruben Fonseca is the substitute for Tondela.
Free kick Nacional.
In the minute 55, Free kick for Nacional in the half of Tondela.
Tondela awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Nacional's Brayan Riascos gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 57, Joao Bento awards Tondela a goal kick.
Nacional are whistled for offside.
Joao Bento signals a free kick to Tondela.
In the minute 59, Joao Bento signals a Nacional throw-in in Tondela's half.
In Funchal a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Nacional to take a throw-in in Tondela territory.
In the minute 60, Tondela needs to be cautious. Nacional have an attacking throw-in.
Nacional advance rapidly upfield but Joao Bento blows for offside.
Joao Bento signals a free kick to Nacional in their own half.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Tondela in their own half.
Free kick Nacional.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Ruben Micael.
In the minute 67, Nacional’s Ruben Micael is on his feet again at Estadio da Madeira.
It's now 2-0 in Funchal as Brayan Riascos scores for Nacional.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Ruben Micael for Nacional who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 70, The home team has substituted Ruben Micael with Chico Ramos. Luis Freire is thus making his second change.
Throw-in for Tondela in their own half.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Nacional at Estadio da Madeira.
Tondela awarded a free kick in their own half.
The away team have replaced Salvador Agra with Mohamed Naoufel Khacef. This is the third substitution made today by Pako Ayestaran.
Throw-in Tondela.
In the minute 76, Play has been interrupted briefly in Funchal to check on Ruben Fonseca, who is grimacing with pain.
Luis Freire is making the team's third substitution at Estadio da Madeira with Kenji Gorre replacing Bryan Rochez.
Tondela's Ruben Fonseca is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 78, Joao Bento awards the home team a throw-in.
The away team replace Mario Gonzalez with Tiago.
In the minute 79, Throw-in for Tondela in their own half.
The away team have replaced Filipe Ferreira with Joao Mendes. This is the fifth substitution made today by Pako Ayestaran.
Ball goes out of play for a Nacional goal kick.
Free kick Nacional.
Tondela have a goal kick.
In the minute 81, Enzo Martinez (Tondela) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Free kick for Tondela in the half of Nacional.
In the minute 83, Free kick for Nacional in their own half.
Mohamed Naoufel Khacef is booked for the away team.
Throw-in for Nacional at Estadio da Madeira.
In the minute 85, Joao Bento signals a free kick to Tondela.
Can Tondela get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nacional's half?
Vincent Thill is on a sub for Joao Camacho for Nacional.
In the minute 87, Nacional have been awarded a corner by Joao Bento.
Lucas Kal (Nacional) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Funchal.
In the minute 87, Important block from the Nacional defence as Jhon Murillo fires in a strike for Tondela.
Jhon Murillo of Tondela gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Nacional at Estadio da Madeira.
Nacional push upfield but Joao Bento quickly pulls them for offside.
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
In Funchal a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Jhon Murillo for Tondela gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Joao Bento awards Nacional a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Tondela.
Brayan Riascos of Nacional smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Tondela's Abdel Jalil gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Nacional have a goal kick.
Joao Bento awards Tondela a goal kick.
Tondela awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Full-time! The final score is 2-0.
Mohamed Naoufel Khacef has been booked for the second time in this match - the red card is coming out!
